text: Singa obabuuza nti ani yatonda eggulu omusanvu n'ensi, ddala bajja kugamba nti Katonda, bagambe nti abaffe (mmwe) mulaba nti ebyo bye musaba nemuleka Katonda singa Katonda aba anjagalizza akabi byo bisobola okugyawo akabiike, oba singa aba anjagalizza kusaasira (kirungi) abaffe byo bisobola okuziyiza okusaasira kwe, gamba nti Katonda ammala (era bulijjo) abaagala ow'okwesiga ye yekka gwe beesiga
